Project Modules¶

Main Module¶

main.greet(name)¶

Greet the user by name.

Parameters:

name (str) – The name of the user.

Returns:

A greeting message.

Return type:

str

Exploratory Data Analysis¶

eda.check_vessel_class(df)¶

Identifies and processes vessel classes specific to fishing vessels. Filters for rows where the ‘Ship Type’ is categorized as ‘Fishing’, extracts distinct values from the ‘Type of mobile’ field, and displays the aggregated count of these distinct types.

Parameters:

df – pyspark.sql.DataFrame A DataFrame containing vessel information, which must include the columns ‘Ship Type’ and ‘Type of mobile’.

eda.extract_fishing_vessels(df)¶

Filters a DataFrame for rows where the “Ship Type” column equals “Fishing”, and saves the filtered data to a new CSV file in a specified directory. The function ensures the target directory exists before writing the CSV file.

Parameters:

df – The input DataFrame containing ship data, with a column named “Ship Type”.

eda.fill_undefined_ship_type(df)¶

Fills undefined ship types in the given DataFrame by determining the appropriate ship type based on existing non-‘Undefined’ ship type values for the same MMSI. This function creates a temporary filled ship type column and then substitutes undefined values in ‘Ship Type’ with the determined values while preserving the original DataFrame structure.

Parameters:

df (pyspark.sql.DataFrame) – Input DataFrame that contains a column ‘Ship Type’ for ship type and a column ‘MMSI’ for the unique ship identifier.

Returns:

A DataFrame where ‘Ship Type’ column values equal to ‘Undefined’

have been updated based on other non-‘Undefined’ values grouped by the corresponding MMSI.

Return type:

pyspark.sql.DataFrame

eda.filter_and_unique(col, mmsi)¶

Filters a DataFrame based on a specific ‘MMSI’ value and retrieves unique values from a specified column in the filtered DataFrame. The function also prints the unique values and displays the filtered DataFrame.

Parameters:

  • col – The name of the column to retrieve unique values from.

  • mmsi – The value to filter the ‘MMSI’ column of the DataFrame.

Returns:

None

p4
